description:
Every touch. Every action. Elevated. The most advanced Match Day in series history. Experience new player animations, elevated on-pitch visuals, refreshed camera angles, a refined highlights system and much more. All combining to bring immersion to new heights. So step into the dugout where every match tells its story. It’s time to change the game.

author: Xbox
description:
When murder calls, Poirot must respond! Embark on the intricate investigation of Agatha Christie - Death on the Nile, now available on Xbox Series X|S.

Death on the Nile is an adventure-detective game, offering a fresh twist on Agatha Christie’s famous story. Set in the lively 1970s, play as Hercule Poirot and detective Jane Royce as they solve two connected mysteries. Dive into a journey filled with intrigue, deception, and unexpected revelations.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/agatha-christie-death-on-the-nile/9PC9XBHMMCFT

author: Xbox
description:
Thanks to its robust toolset and gameplay design, Rhythm Doctor is one of the only games in existence able to act as a video editor for its own trailer. Everything in this trailer is a single shot without any cuts or splices, all set to a mashup of songs, ending with a release date announcement: you'll be able to play the full version of Rhythm Doctor on PC and Xbox on December 6!

author: Xbox
description:
The fight for Pywel begins March 19, 2026. Pre-order Crimson Desert now and let a new chapter of this land's history begin.

(This gameplay trailer contains actual in-game footage. As a work-in-progress, the content is subject to change.)

About Crimson Desert  
Crimson Desert is an open-world action-adventure game developed by Pearl Abyss. A devastating ambush in the deep of night by their sworn enemies the Black Bears leaves members of the Greymanes dead or scattered across the continent. The Greymane Kliff is determined to reunite with his surviving comrades and rebuild what was lost. But on a journey where alliances are forged, dangers abound, and mysterious factions are uncovered, Kliff comes to realize that an unprecedented threat and a destiny greater than he imagined await him. 

Reach beyond and experience the world of Crimson Desert on March 19, 2026 on Xbox Series X|S and PC.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/crimsondesert/9NG592G0W474

#CrimsonDesert #PearlAbyss 

SUBSCRIB
title: Crimson Desert - Release Date Reveal Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
Pre-order the ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X today. Available October 16th.

Experience seamless PC gaming on the go with ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X –  two new handhelds that combine the power of Xbox with the freedom of Windows 11, created together with ASUS.

- ROG Xbox Ally: powered by an ultra-efficient AMD Ryzen™ Z2 A Processor - balancing performance and power consumption to maximize battery life without sacrificing gameplay quality - 16GB of RAM and 512GB of SSD storage.
- ROG Xbox Ally X: features the all-new AMD Ryzen™ AI Z2 Extreme processor - allowing us to bring new experiences to life including greater frames-per-second, sharp visuals and increased intelligence - double the storage to have more native games at your fingertips, and 24GB of high-speed RAM that more demanding games crave.

Pre-order now at https://www.xbox.com/handhelds/rog-xbox-ally

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR
